titleStmt.title: The causes of our present calamities in reference to the trade of the nation fully discovered with the most proper expedient to remedy the same : whereby the war it self may become as certainly advantageous, as a peace will be destructive / humbly presented by James Whiston.
titleStmt.author: Whiston, James, 1637?-1707.

notesStmt.note: Reproductions of originals in Huntington Library and British Library.
